result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donald J. Turnmire

records.addlTxt:
3:36 PM Defendant Donald J. Turnmire in court.  Attorney Peter Michael Masana in court for Donald J. Turnmire.  Attorney Michael X. Albrecht in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and appearances.  Court notes BFH still pending for 11/21/22 and vacates that BFH.  Atty Masana is asking for a PH.  Bond continued.  Court admonishes DE to stay in touch w/counsel.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:23 PM Defendant Donald J. Turnmire appeared by video, in custody from LEC with Atty. Hayes.  Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Hayes states DE was COVID positive and tried to get ahold Atty. Masana however Atty. out of office.  State requests $2500 CASH bond.  Atty. Hayes requests reinstate $100 cash bond.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  Court reinstates $100 but requests an additional $400.00 CASH bond to be posted for a total of $500.00 Cash bond.
Return date scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Return date on October 10, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

1:47 pm  Defendant Donald J. Turnmire not in court.  Attorney Peter Michael Masana not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant and orders cash bond forfeiture commence.

2:58 PM Prosecuting attorney Emily Eklund in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Donald J. Turnmire appeared by video, in custody from LEC w/atty. Getsinger. Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  DE does qualify for PD representation.  Atty. Getsinger wishes this to be dismissed, not properly charged, this was a csup work release failure to return. Court sets over for parties to brief this issue, need case law and review.  Will proceed to bail hearing. State recommends $2000 Cash bail.  Atty. Getsinger makes argument.  $100.00 CASH Bond set.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Return date scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on September 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on September 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Donald J. Turnmire appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes appeared by video for Donald J. Turnmire.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court finds probable cause for today's hearing.
Initial appearance scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
